content.detailedDescription: Me an two friends were going o the store last night to get some beer and i was looking out the window and suddenly this ball like object an it was glowing like a  super saiyan from dragon ball z(dbz). came down from the atmosphere and hovered for 1 minute with a static like aura and static sound and shock, it was yellow/goldish and in the center was white and what looked like an apparational figure or feature of some sort and like i said before it was orb like in appearance. it was pulsatingly bright as well and only i alone could feel that static and hear the pulse from it and i dont know why. but after one minute it took off at superman speed straight and then it changed its coarse and went west towards the woods. today i saw not one but six to seven military helicopters pass over my college to the direction that the object went. the feeling in had last night was shock awe and i barely had any sleep just thinking about it and the funny thing is is that today was my last final exam. i barely ate lunch today and usually im a pretty hungry guy. i was surprised that i wasn't even hungry and ive never felt this way before. its supper time and im still not hungry. but thats my case. i didnt have time to record it sadly. nobody has to believe me but i know what i saw last night and i know what i feel.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: It was yellow glowing with a whitelight  in the centar and it had an apparitional figure and a white aura around it and was static

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work with my co workers we were heading south on sheridan about 92th.We saw what appeared to be fireball in the sky or meteor descending in the southeastern sky somewhere in the castle rock area or closer.Three other fireballs fell out of the first one and begun to hover.They then moved into some kind of fotmation and hovered for a moment.Then begun a zig zagging motion stop crossed one another's flight path stopped ascended descended blinked out came back on and continued this behavior for about 30-50 secs.Upon further inspection they appeared to be boomeranged shaped with multiple yellow orange lights across the surface.We stopped at a red light so i tried to take a pic with my phone but was unable to capture the event cuz the windshield was dirty and the red glare of the traffic light.Fortunately when this event occurred i was on the phone with my friend who had his camcorder on hand and was able to obtain video evidence. he himself has had multiple sightings in the recent past.As to the feelings i had i was very excited and i had the weird feeling that something very big and significant is on the horizon. ultimately i just want to get this information out there.Ty for your time dr.
content.summary: Strange lights over denver

content.detailedDescription:
Had just gotten home, just after dark to my 4th floor apartment near the edge of downtown los angeles. it was around 6:30 pm, i looked out my window to the west, and noticed a fairly bright light, that was still in the sky. i often see helicopters in the sky at night here, always, in fact, but this light was not a helicopter. there was no blinking light on it whatsoever, and i watched it for a solid hour. i at first thought it was a hovering helicopter, but the length of time it was there, soundless proved that it was not,

i have a very low quality "mustek" sd video camera, and shot about 15-20 minutes of horrible, low quality video, with sound, several shots of 1 to 4-5 minutes each, over the hour.

significantly, i saw the light at about the same time, on the next evening, last night 12/12/13. i shot another couple minutes of video, but did not follow the light, i got distracted and did not check on it.

at any rate, after watching the light for about fifteen minutes, it began to move farther west and south. i do not know if there were any winds aloft, but it moved about 20 miles over an hour, fairly fast, and i lost it on the horizon somewhere over i would say near venice.

it was hovering lower than the flight of the police helicopters flying by, they all looked to be higher than this disembodied light. i have binoculars, and no matter how carefully i focused upon it, never saw any shape around the light, but the light itself was seemingly oval shaped, it had the appearance of an electric light, it twinkled on the crappy video, but it did not waver in person. in the course of the cuts in the video, it got progressively farther away and smaller.

my reporting this incident is actually an inquiry about any further sightings, to co-relate what i saw. the pathway of this light was by my estimation, from the time i observed it from the mid-wilshire neighborhood, and south and west of there to the beach, a very densely populated area. i saw it again last night, still in about the exact same spot as the night before.
content.summary: Watched a hovering light, over the course of an hour it traveled about 20 miles across sky.

content.detailedDescription: On the 11th of dec. 2013 i was traveling home from work on junction 214 toward sumerco toward wv rt. 3. it was approximately 7:45 pm i was looking up out my driver side window to see if the sky was clearing, because it was suppose to be very cold that night, when i noticed three lights very close together in a triangle shape. i slowed down to see if it was blinking like a plane, but it was not. it traveled like a plane across the sky but i have never seen a plane without blinking lights and in that shape or formation before. i observed it for about 2 min. flying across the sky until it went out of sight over the mountain. im not saying its a traditional ufo but, not a plane either.
content.summary: Triangle of lights steady

content.detailedDescription: Video3gpp_0.3gp
content.summary: Lights in the right-hand side upper corner of video you see lights in line during storm

content.detailedDescription: I was watering beckett golf club on a clear night in sept. 1980. i saw a bright lime green shooting star fall. when i got home i looked up meteorites in the encyclopedia and learned they can give of gases of different colors. two weeks later two weeks later was the real show. i walked out of the work shop (another area on the golf course) and in front of me high up about 1:00 high was another(or the same 1 returned)hovering motinless fo 3-5 seconds. it was a round glowing flouresent lime green object. then a saw a flouresent red-orange pencil like tail stretch out of it and it darted away. i could see it travel with the red following it until it disappeared behind the tree line. trees were pretty far away so i knew it wasn't a bottle rocket.
content.summary: 2 sightings in a 2 week period. 1st looked like green shooting star. 2nd the object hovered ,grew a red tail and darted away lost sight when descended behind the tree lines.

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i saw something weird last night from our home in suburban franklin ma area - about 25 miles or so southwest of boston.  he brought my attention to it.  it was after sunset and quite dark, maybe around 6:00 pm or so.  he was getting ready to go somewhere and said there was a strange object in the sky with blinking lights going over the house.  he told me to go to the back door and see it (as it should have  been over the house by then).  i think that would make the direction it was flying approximately southeast to northwest (i'm terrible with directions though).  it was flying fairly low, at about commercial aircraft altitude (low enough to eventually pass out of sight behind the trees).
 
it was moving slowly, it looked like it was moving much slower than a regular plane, and it made no noise.   i didn't see any other planes in the sky right at that point.  it had 3 white lights (presumably on the backside that we were looking at as it flew away from us), in a straight horizontal line, and they were flashing on and off in a regular interval of every few seconds until the object itself disappeared from view. there were no other lights, like the red and green lights on a regular plane.  i took a video of it on my crappy cell phone, but it was at quite a distance from us by that point and all you see is the row of white lights blinking in the distance, so i don't know if it's useful.  the whole thing lasted less than 10 minutes from the time he sighted it.
 
now it might just be a regular plane or some other known aircraft, but i haven't seen something like that before and neither has my boyfriend, and it just seemed odd. that's the only emotion either of us had, was that it seemed odd, with the flashing white lights. i'm wondering if you know that it's a regular aircraft of some type, or if not, you've seen other reports like this.  i've seen planes with the blinking red lights, of course, but not with 3 white lights in a straight line, and i'm wondering what kind of plane or aircraft would have that physical configuration?  so i'm not assuming it's some weird, unknown thing, just unknown to us.  maybe someone has some familiarity with this?  we've never seen that before and we look at the skies out here quite a bit (we have a pretty clear view of much of the sky when the weather cooperates).
content.summary: Object at commercial aircraft altitude after dark 6 pm from se to nw in straight line with no sound. 3 flashing white lights in straight horizontal line as object flew away at very slow speed and lost past trees. regular flash lasted, 10 minutes or less
Sideways shaped diamond,white.Flew over buildings coming from the beach

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching planes overhead while standing in my yard. charlotte douglas airport has flight pattern right by my house. i noticed this plane at normal cruising altitude with a craft flying above it. it shadowed the plane speed for speed.It was three times or more larger than the jumbo airliner. it was about six stories or more in height. it was silver in color and no windows that i could see. i watched the plane and the ufo untill
 they were both out of sight. i know this was not a man made object. i was in the us air force for five years and i know what a plane looks like. this was no plane.
content.summary: From my yard, i saw a large ufo flying above a jet liner. twice the size of the plane .And six stories tall and silver and rectangular.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home then at the moment sumthing told me to look to my left and there it was a glowing orange triangle. making formations and then a 4rd ufo went inside the triangle, when i saw this my body was in shock, first thing that came to my mind was to drive fast to my house to get the video camera. while parking and running to the house and finding the camera, 5 to 10 minutes passed so i thought i was already gone, but when i went to the spot it was still there and caught it all on tape. i have hours of footage but i dont trust youtube or web. my number is 305 766 8801 . if interested i wouldent mind sending video photos of the ufo. i even caught 6 ufos all together and a mothership turning 6 different colors, but just need sumone to trust with this.
content.summary: Triangles in formation

content.detailedDescription: Am not the actual viewer but got a call from my cousin whilst they were looking at these lights.Am reporting this on behalf of a dozen people who encountered these flying objects.It was in luangwa area and people in the area say its not the first time there encountering the lights in the sky. a month before the saw the same lights in the sky. these lights were just hovering and when they try to capture them with their cell phones the objects cant be seen.Numerous people were seeing these lights in luangwa. i thought you might be interested and take a look into the matter.
content.summary: Lights hovering in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
friday, january 25th, 2013, at 8:35 pm, i was driving down the north road, near the east end school, in portland, maine.  i was driving in a northerly direction, about 20 mph, and saw lights moving in a southerly direction.  they were so distinct that i quickly stopped to observe them.  

so i'm looking to my left (west) and i see these strange lights moving pretty fast, not supersonic but i'm guessing about 720 mph.  (see below.)

they were 6 of them, in a formation that changed as they moved.  it initially looked like two in the lead, side by side, two following in a straight line between the two leading, and two more in the rear that were side by side.  the formation appeared to change as they moved along.  they appeared to come closer to the earth, then moved up in height and veered toward the west, disappearing into the night sky.  this whole thing took place in a period of maybe 2 minutes or less. 

i was cursing myself for not having my camera, which i almost always have, but then thought i might as well do what i can with the iphone.  

they had a strange light that looked like an umbrella, actually more like an inverted u,  and they glowed with a bit of orangeness.  there was no flickering.  and they looked nothing like an airplane.  i wondered if they could be helicopters and cranked down my window and there was no noise, from anything, even on the ground.  there was no traffic and it's a quiet area of portland.  besides, i've seen many helicopters at night over the years and these were much higher (i'd guess maybe 1-2 thousand feet) and were moving in a way that was unfamiliar to me.

i am including the pictures i took with my iphone4s, with explanatory notes.  i have not edited these pictures at all.

this first shot was taken at 8:35:27.  i don't know the source of the light pollution on the right of the picture.  the objects were heading southwesterly and beginning to ascend.






this second shot was taken at 8:35:32.  an expert on speed/distance might be able to calculate the speed of the objects by comparing the movement with the times shot.  i'm guessing at distances but looking at the map, am estimating they would have traveled from an area around windham, me, to somewhere around waterboro, me.  in the approximate 2 minutes i watched them.  this would put their speed at 720 miles per hour if i'm right.   





the third shot was taken at 8:35:50.  note the comparative distance traveled in 18 seconds.  speed?  see above. 




this last shot was taken at 8:36:41.  this was 51 seconds later and the first two of the lights had ascended, moving towards the southwest, and disappeared in the night sky.  




finally, the time from the first shot to the last shot was 1 minute, 14 seconds.  if they were traveling 720 miles per hour, this would mean they covered about 35 miles while i watched, including about 45 seconds before i started taking the pictures.  this seems approximately right.
content.summary: 6 lights in formation, 2 side by side in front; 2 one behind other in middle; 2 in rear aside.

content.detailedDescription:
At 11:45pm, wednesday, dec 11th, i was walking near bellingham intl. airport. i saw what appeared to be an aircraft on final approach to the airport from the south. i then realized that what should be the "landing lights" were all red, instead of white. i stopped and observed the cluster of red lights move toward my location, slowing until completely stopped and hovering silently, almost directly overhead. it was maybe the size of a golf ball held at arm's length.

i saw a large, central red light, surrounded by 5 smaller, bright red lights, with all lights pulsating rapidly (though not in synch with each other). 

being almost-midnight, with virtually no car traffic, and certainly no other people on the street (a semi-rural location), while i stood under a street light, i wondered if whoever was piloting the object was aware of me, looking up at "them."

after maybe 3 minutes, the object began moving, once-again, to the north, very slowly. almost immediately, the lights began flickering-out and within just a few seconds, they all disappeared while the object was still almost directly overhead.
content.summary: Cluster of bright red lights approaching at low altitude. when overhead, craft stopped and hovered. i saw a large, centered, red light, surrounded by 5 smaller red lights.

content.detailedDescription:
On thanksgiving night (11-28-13) around 8 i was looking at venus through my telescope in my yard, my house was directly behind me. i started viewing venus when it was at the south-eastern sky and continued to view it till it got to the northeast sky. at that time, around 8:50 or 9:15 i got tired of looking at venus and turned around, 180 degrees, and pointed my telescope to jupiter when i noticed the orb. it was impossible for me not to notice it once i had turned around because it was hovering about 2 yards from my rooftop and about 5 yards from me physically. at first i thought it was a paper ballon or some sort of paper that caught on fire and the wind had lifted it up off the ground but after further inspection it looked like a stationary flame and i was immediately blown. i wanted to yell for my dad to come take a look but i knew it was a once in a life time situation so i pulled out my iphone trying as best to resist the urge of excited. in fact i was so shocked that i thought i was taking video but realized it was only on the camera so i snapped a picture and switched to video. right after i snapped the picture the stationary flame turned into a perfect sphere and began moving towards the north. it moved slowly, as it moved towards the north it elevated to the tree-top hight and continued it's path towards the north. meanwhile my dogs were going haywire-barking from the bottoms of their lungs. as i tried running to the top of my door steps i lost sight of the orb over the rest of the trees. i ran inside and began yelling excitingly, showing my family the picture and video, until there was an eerie atmosphere in the kitchen. no one believed me so i just put it off and ha dinner with my family. 
two weeks later, today (12-12-13), my neighbor snapped a photograph of a similar colored orb moving across his farm.  i decided to post these photos online and a flood of people around my town began confessing to seeing a same color orb...Each sighting occurred on a thursday and all sighting in rural areas.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Yellowish-orange-red orb that hovered in place like a flame then turned into a sphere

content.detailedDescription: I was at my house and went outside to smoke a cigarette when i noticed  a bright light hovering in the northeast sky at 0350am. it was pulsing and changing colors and made no sound while it hovered.
content.summary: Something very bright was hovering in the northeast sky that was pulsing and changing colors,. it made no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
I often would be outside at night cause in superior we have a very clear sky even as a teen i was always looking up at the night sky. one night i was out in the backyard and seen a very bright light, very blue i thought maybe it was airvac cause our town was use to airlift people out to hospitals from near by highway accidents. i kept looking at it and it wasn't moving then i seen it fall behind a mountain. if you seen how it fell i got a chill cause i thought it had crashed but then it came right back up with speed and stopped. at this point i knew it was something else. i am getting chills just writing this. i ran back inside and grabbed my cannon rebel camera it was an auto focus so the flash needed to be on to focus i took a few pics of it at a distance and of course flash was going off and had to recharge then in a matter of 1 second the object travelled 5 miles and stopped right above my location i got one picture off and it just disappeared after that. istill have negative, i've been watching all these ufo shows and thought i could finally show it to someone who would believe me, in the late 90s i brought the pic to school to show everyone and everyone was amazed by the picture. the top part of the object is blue and some of the bottom is red and the front is what i could only describe as a beatle beak. feel free to contact me i'd love to have someone look at the negative i do have a pic on the same negative where i took a pic of the moon 3 times in one pic but i was testing out ways to take better pics at night in case i got another chance. 

i will go to wal-mart and get another set of pics made from the negative with a digital copy sorry i was not prepared with an attachment, i wrote so much i don't wanna lose the work i can always get pic later or mail you the negitive.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright blue hover very fast stop hover travelled incredible speed

content.detailedDescription:
There are two occurinces the first i noticed three strange lights moving across the sky,and they were glowing a oragish light that was pulsating but at the same time like they were pulsating in sequense,then the first one went straight up, soon after the other two did the same. 
 the sencond time was two weeks later,we were standing outside when my girl friend at the time noticed the same kinda lights flying across the sky,we watched a few go by when i pulled out my phone n video taped the last one flyin all around n then took off.Then when i wathched the film i noticed other "things flyin up there that wasnt visible til i took it home n watched it. im hopin someone can help w this question,what are they?
content.summary: Glowing lights hovering n then goinstraight up

content.detailedDescription:
A friend of mine and i were outside late at night, just hanging out and talking. all of a sudden, we saw three lights in a triangular formation in the sky. my father is military, and has showed me what different airplanes look like at night, so of course i tried to match these lights up to the lights of common airplanes. just as i was trying to figure it out, the lights all moved at once to the right in the sky at an outrageous speed. they zipped to the left and diagonally to the right again, all the while keeping in a triangular formation. they were moving so fast it was hard to keep up with them. 
	my friend and i watched in amazement and a little bit of terror as well. it was so strange; we both had never seen anything like it in our lives. the lights decided to zoom towards us; they seemed so close that i thought if i reached out i could touch them. but before i could do that, the lights sped off into the distance and disappeared. it was a truly amazing experience.
content.summary: 3 lights in triangular formation, zipped around in the blink of an eye

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking a doggie, looked up, east, saw bright heavenly body in a space between clouds and waved to it, just in case it was one of the orbs, it was probably a star or planet though.
i then turned to the west, and saw a very bright magenta light from the n/w beneath some of the clouds.
it had a very slight orange hue, a faint pulse or blink, but certainly nothing like the air traffic seen around pbi airport. i was glad to see it, and tried to listen for motor noise. i was holding a flashlight so i shone it at the bright light, then remembered someone hurt a pilot with a laser pointer so i stopped. 

 it quietly moved straight toward s/w, passing into a large cloud and re-emerging into open air as it began to fade into the distance. that was really impressive because, if it was going to the airport it would need to descend, instead, it went on out and either left the atmosphere or gradually turned down the volume on it's light gear...

i stood there a moment smiling, saying 'yes, yes' and then a small white 'falling star' dropped in the s/w. 

the whole episode was brief, yet quite satisfying...
is there a pink/orange light drone program going on, cruising above military trail in west palm beach?
as pretty as  the light was, i don't think so.

i hear there's a meteor shower occurring... i don't think this quite fits though...
 i've seen these orbs before. especially over longmont, co, this past summer...
 before the big floods hit that area.
content.summary: Bright, quiet, deliberate, beautiful magenta orb straight path, fade out. then a tiny 'falling star' blip.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to las vegas nevada and my wife's sisters son took a picture with his nintendo ds at the buildings in las vegas, and when we got to the room, he noticed a black dot on one of his pictures and i zoomed it and this ufo image was there, i got surprised when i seen that picture, and years later i seen a v ufo in two occasions, while driving in the 91 west freeway in orange county california, i have more info, but story is to long.
content.summary: A disc shape ufo and a v shape ufo
content.locationName: And also in orange county, Nevada

content.detailedDescription: Got out of my car at the wegmans in warringtown bucks county, happened to look up and saw a very large white in color , what seemed to be 30 small orbs flying in unasin the weird part was accompanying the orbs were 2 all white airplanes flying all together , saw it for 30 seconds or so, then it dissapeared over the building, just then i checked my facebook and saw someone in whitehall pa seeing the same exact thing at the same time and whitehall is 40 miles away from warrington! shortly after i saw a black helicopter flying in the area
content.summary: V shaped orbes over pa

content.detailedDescription: Thought it was a star but there's no star that moves a few feet in the sky then hovers and has simultaneously flashing lights.
content.summary: Hovering then move 1-5ft then hovering

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling north in my truck from cumming, ga towards jasper, ga on a very heavily traveled roadway with many other vehicles present at 5:44pm eastern standard time. i turned northbound from majors road in the cumming\milton, ga area on to post road. while turning northbound, i happened to notice a pulsating light that appeared to be either a star or a light on top of a radio or cellular tower. i studied it for a moment because i was able to immediately rule out a star when the light began to flash "on and off." i then ruled out a light from a cell tower or radio tower because the light wasn't pulsating or flashing in a manner consistent with the flashing of a warning light. it was random and captured my attention that i then began to split between driving, talking on my cell phone, and observing this object. i tracked the object intermittently out of the passenger side of my truck for apx. one minute, at which time i looked away to the road ahead, viewed back to the right, and the object was gone. i assumed that i had "passed" the object and that it was now in my blind-spot behind me and wasn't going to think about it further. then, about 4 seconds later, i turned a small corner with a group of trees and, as the trees cleared from the view of my windshield, i noticed an object that was apx. the size of a ping-pong ball held out in front of me at arm's length directly in front of me. the height of the object immediately ruled out a plane and the object was emitting red, blue, and white flashing lights that didn't blink in any specific sequence. it was immediately clear that the object was not something that i had seen before. i exclaimed to the person on the phone that i was talking to that i was witnessing a u.F.O. she, of course, laughed at the notion, however, i asserted that it was not a joke. she told me to pull over and take a picture. i told her that i would call her back and i hung up the phone so i could get a picture. i pulled into a neighborhood and kept the object in my sites the entire time until i had to jump out of the vehicle. when i put the vehicle in park, and opened the door to jump out, the object disappeared. it didn't "speed away" or accelerate at a high speed,,, it just disappeared as if it just instantly "cloaked" itself by turning off it's lights. i stood for a few more moments scanning the twilight sky to see if the object would re-appear but it didn't. i was completely astounded by the whole event because i couldn't believe that i had seen such an event and i also couldn't believe that the many other vehicles on the road appeared to not see the event at all. it was a very confusing and surreal thing.
content.summary: Observed an object hovering over the road that had bright flashing red, blue, and white lights that flashed randomly and then disappeared almost instantaniously.

content.detailedDescription: My 2 daughter called me and said dad come out and look at these lights. eight objects moved together across the night sky
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Eight objects moving together across eastern sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home and looked up at the stars as i usually do. i noticed an odd light that was much too low to be a star and it was not venus either. it doesn't look like it's in outer space- it looks like it is here on earth. i have pointed it out to many people and now they too are watching in amusement. it is visible after the sun goes down and shines brighter than our moon! it seems to pulsate in different colors. i did n internet search and have come across hundreds who have ben observing it for months now---yet no one is speaking of this on any news source i have come across. i feel that i am drawn to it whenever i look up- its an eerie feeling...Almost as if the light is watching me and knows that i am watching it...Very strange. i am very logical person and i would prefer to dismiss this as venus--but it is not and it is not a star. i am hoping you guys have an answer to this spectacle!
content.summary: I have been seen a glowing light in the western hemisphere for approximately 4 weeks now. it is much too low to be venus or a star.

content.detailedDescription: My wife noticed a set of very bright lights out one of the bedroom windows. it was around 2100hrs et. she called me to come over and look.  i observed the object and determined it was not a star. it was in the southeast sky about 60 degrees above the horizon from our perspective.  there seemed to be multiple lights all in a straight line (on a diagonal to the horizon). i got my binoculars but could not hold them steady on the object  for a definitive observation. i then went for my meade telescope ( which i use for stargazing) and focused on the object. i confirmed that there were a set or 4 very white, very bright lights. again they were on a slant to the horizon and holding steady. i could not make out any other physical shape. the object remained motionless throughout the entire observation. we did notice small objects ejected from the craft in the form of red lights. they went to earth but we did not see them land as they were behind some trees ... perhaps a mile away(to the east). we did not observe them heading back to the object in the sky. there was a small plane in the area heading to the southwest,but it soon passed and was observed no more. when we first observed the object the sky was perfectly clear. light cloud cover did obscure the object on occasion as we continued to observe, but it kept reappearing as the cloud cover diminished. it was in the same place as before. we observed for about 1.5 hours and then the object was fully obscured by cloud cover. i want to note that before focusing on the object, i trained my telescope on jupiter and clearly observed the planet and 4 of its moons.  the planet was glowing (like our moon) and definitely not a bright white light. i then swung the telescope over the object and began my observation. it was no star.
content.summary: Set of bright white lights in a fixed position on a slant to the horizon

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way upto my friends house to let her dogs out it was 8pm and as i came out of my front door something caught my eye in the sky it was 3 white circle orbs facing north of my neighbours house over there roof as i carried on walking they started moving towards robinswood hill i told my husband that i think i seen a ufo i lost sight of this object then as i carried on walking it was gone my 14 year old seen it 2 at first he thought it was a laser beam until it appeared like a orb and moved no sound was heard
content.summary: I seen three circle orbs in the sky over north of my neighbours house then moved towards robinswood hill direction gloucester no noise

content.detailedDescription: Asgfdfghdfh
content.summary: Dfghdfgh

content.detailedDescription: Asdfasdf
content.summary: Asdfasdf

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from night classes at csun where i was getting my masters degree,  i spotted something hovering about 20 feet above an electrical pole, directly across the street from the hughes missile systems group buildings in canoga park, california.  
 
two cars ahead of me were pulling over to the curb and a couple of cars behind me did the same.  we all got out of our cars and were looking at the object.  i asked if anyone knew what it was, but no one answered.  there was no fear, just incredulity.  

after about one minute it took off at an incredible rate of speed to the southeast.  it was not possible to determine a shape; just lights in a circular pattern.  it was almost as if it were transparent.   it took only seconds to disappear.

when i got home i told my husband, an engineer employed by lockheed, what i had seen.  he said it was probably a c5a going in to burbank airport.  i asked if a c5a could hover.  he said no.  i said it wasn't a plane.  i do remember a general feeling of calm when i knew i should be agitated and that calmness persists to this day.

i've never really shared this experience with  many others.  not that i didn't think they would believe me, buy because i had a general feeling that i shouldn't.
content.summary: Observed hovering above electrical pole directly opposite the hughes missile systems group buildings
